body:
Add missing `event_*` flags to `libbitcoin_util`. #26293 + the commit dropping boost cppflags from `libbitcoin_util` shows this issue. i.e:
```bash
  CXX      util/libbitcoin_util_a-url.o
util/url.cpp:7:10: fatal error: 'event2/http.h' file not found
#include <event2/http.h>
         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1 error generated.
```

Consistently use `EVENT_PTHREADS_CFLAGS` and `EVENT_PTHREADS_LIBS` alongside `EVENT_CFLAGS` and `EVENT_LIBS`.
